short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the text shown in any app or website on your browser in plain text ready to paste into ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- CopyClick copies all text/chats displayed on a webpage to clipboard ready to be pasted into ChatGPT or similar.

- Works with emails, just have it open on the screen.

- Easily query any website with one click.

Compatibility with PDFs coming soon!
